meta.intro: One of the most important factors necessary for a company’s success is having the right employees. Selecting the right person for every position can be a very long and difficult task for the HR department.

items.title: Recruitment & Selection: Streamlining your Hiring Process

meta.intro: A company’s success depends highly on the performance of its employees. If your employees work as per a set of objectives, your company is more likely to progress but when employees don’t deliver as they are expected to, the company might suffer the consequences like not completing required tasks on time and lacking behind on certain trends to name a few.

You never get a second chance to make a great first impression and first impressions can have a long-lasting impact! Therefore it should be a high priority for companies to make new employees feel welcomed, valued, and prepared to succeed in their new role.

items.title: Onboarding: A Guide on welcoming new employees
